TextView.android:text: Doors, windows or other openings are close fitting or otherwise pestproofed to less than 1/4 inches or 6mm
Air curtain present at each entry & Functioning properly
Air Directional vanes are properly aligned
Air roof,ceiling & wall junction areas are leak proof & free from harborage / hiding areas
All sliding windows / Exhaust fan windows, skylights & openings that must be kept open for ventilation are screened with 16*16 mesh to prevent the pest entry
Openings / Holes, Cracks & Crevices in Floor OR on Wall surfaces are identified to prevent debris from lodging & to Avoid Pest OR Microbial Harborages
Observed Residue OR Spillage of pest Susceptible Raw / Finished Product Material accumulated in the area
Rodent stations are fixed at specified interval, labeled, locked & are in good condition

Insect light traps are installed at in-between 5 to 7 ft.height & in a way that it does not attract insects to the Facility or open Food. Shatterproof lights are used in all units. All Insect Light Trap's fascia are in good condition.Insect Light Traps are installed farther than 10ft from food contact surfacces & Food Storages
Floor & floor drains are clean & free flowing,as there is no grease material accumulation or water stagnation which attract flies & acts as fly breeding area
